value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...ake up.$k$p...Wake UP.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Ugnh...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Well, if you insist on sleeping, I can
take this chance to finally end you...
Any last words?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|W-wait!$k$pPrincess Veronica? What are we—
...Where are we?!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|After you fell asleep, the nightmares
just disappeared.$k$pI'm not sure what you did,
but it seems to have worked...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I see. Thank goodness everything
is finally back to normal.$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|...Fool.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...F-Freyja?!$k$pHow are you—$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|I told you. No matter what you do,
there is no escape.$k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|It...isn't over?$k$pBut how?! Without the power of
Dream-King Freyr, your nightmares
should have no influence on reality!$k$pSo, how are y—$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Why would I tell you when I can
leave the question to gnaw away
at your mind...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|No matter what you do, nightmares
will haunt your every step... Nothing
can change that.$k$p

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|What does she mean?$k$pWeren't you going to make the
nightmares disappear?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm sorry... It wasn't supposed
to be like this.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I am so, so sorry. After you put
your trust in me, this is how it
all turned out.$k$pI don't understand it! Why...HOW
are the nightmares still crossing
over into reality?$k$pMirabilis! Do you have any idea?$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Zzz... Zzz...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Mirabilis! Wake up!$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|*yawn*$k$pI have no clue. I don't know anything
about anything...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We have nowhere left to run...
But for now, we have no choice
but to keep moving.$k$pThe nightmares will be on our
heels no matter where we go.$k$pWe'll just have to fend them off
as best we can as we retreat...
Until we have a better plan.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|After all that, we finally wake ready
for a good morning...only to have
nightmares still chasing us...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|It's all right! No matter if we're in
a dream or reality, we always find
some way to overcome the odds!$k$pNow, let's run!$k$p$Sbs150|
